description: Online self-paced lessons on Möbius covering Algebra, Calculus, and Maple. Includes videos, exercises with instant feedback, and weekly deadlines. Best 6 out of 9 weeks count.
Two supervised in-person tests (40 minutes each) focusing on Algebra, Calculus, and Maple usage. Lab Test 1 is without Maple, Lab Test 2 requires Maple. Practice tests provided.
Typed solutions to exam-style questions focusing on written communication. Requires equation editors (Word/LaTeX) and submission via Turnitin. Emphasizes clarity and mathematical validity.
2-hour supervised exam covering all course content via Möbius. Tests deeper understanding, unexpected applications, and Maple knowledge. Conducted in-person during exam period.
